parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 1 <= Index in the current list of selected items <= ISelectionMgr::GetSelectedObjectCount2

parameters.name: SelectByString
parameters.description: Feature name of object at Index; "" if object is not a feature

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of object at Index as defined in swSelectType_e

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate of object at Index; 0 if SelectByString is not ""

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of object at Index; 0 if SelectByString is not ""

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of object at Index; 0 if SelectByString is not ""

title: ISelectionMgr.GetSelectionSpecification
description: Gets the selection specification at the specified index of the current selection list.
signature:
System.Boolean GetSelectionSpecification( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   out System.String
SelectByString
,
   out System.String
ObjectType
,
   out System.Int32
Type
,
   out System.Double
X
,
   out System.Double
Y
,
   out System.Double
Z
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 1 <= Index in the current list of selected items <= ISelectionMgr::GetSelectedObjectCount2

parameters.name: SelectByString
parameters.description: Feature name of object at Index; "" if object is not a feature

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of object at Index as defined in swSelectType_e

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate of object at Index; 0 if SelectByString is not ""

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of object at Index; 0 if SelectByString is not ""

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of object at Index; 0 if SelectByString is not ""

returns: True if successful, false if not
